channel.title: Back On Topic
channel.description: From the morons that brought you That Loud Honda and The FAKE Greek, comes the brand new dumb millennial idea of bringing a podcast you didn't ask for. Straight out of their mom's basement, join Gregory, Anthony, Guzman, Dino, and other idiots in Back On Topic, a podcast about their attempts and failures in life as they constantly talk over each other and make no sense whatsoever. Maybe some facts or wisdom will poke through, but probably not.
channel.itunes:author: Anthony Tagliaferri

item.title: Dino Introduces The Guys
item.description: Taken from episode 1 when Dino does all the work and takes over introducing Tyler, Jonathan, and Anthony. Greg on the other hand spoke enough on his own.
item.itunes:author: Dino Gonias

item.title: Crashing Friends' Cars
item.description: Greg, Dino, Tyler, Jonathan, and Anthony introduce themselves and discuss the numerous amount of car crashing stories they have to share. We are amazing with first impressions as you can tell.
item.itunes:author: Gregory Nemesdy
